DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety immunogenicity accelerate schedule recombinant canarypox vaccine ALVAC-HIV MN120TMG ( vCP205 ) versus control follow boost rgp120/HIV-1 SF2 vaccine HIV-negative volunteer . Frequent injection ALVAC-HIV vCP205 may result rapid induction cytotoxic T-lymphocytes . This trial evaluate whether accelerated vaccination schedule produce immunological response comparable obtained trial ALVAC-HIV vCP205 .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Safety Immunogenicity Trial Live Recombinant Canarypox ALVAC-HIV ( vCP205 ) HIV-1 SF-2 rgp120 HIV-1 Uninfected Volunteers Evaluate Accelerated Vaccine Schedules
DOC.detailed_description: Frequent injection ALVAC-HIV vCP205 may result rapid induction cytotoxic T-lymphocytes . This trial evaluate whether accelerated vaccination schedule produce immunological response comparable obtained trial ALVAC-HIV vCP205 . Volunteers randomize receive immunization either ALVAC-HIV vCP205 ALVAC-RG rabies glycoprotein ( vCP65 ) day 0 , 7 , 14 , 21 , follow boost rgp120/HIV-1 SF2 day 28 84 . A third cohort receive ALVAC-HIV vCP65 schedule follow boost placebo .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Volunteers must : Normal history physical exam . Negative ELISA Western blot HIV . CD4 count > = 400 cells/mm3 . Normal urine dipstick esterase nitrite . Lowerrisk sexual behavior . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Volunteers follow symptoms condition exclude : Positive hepatitis B surface antigen . Medical psychiatric condition ( recent suicidal ideation present psychosis ) preclude compliance . Occupational responsibility preclude compliance . Active syphilis . NOTE : Subjects serology document false positive due remote ( > 6 month ) treat infection eligible . Active tuberculosis . NOTE : Subjects positive PPD normal chest xray show evidence TB require isoniazid therapy eligible . Allergy egg product neomycin . Occupational exposure bird . Volunteers follow prior condition exclude : History immunodeficiency , chronic illness , autoimmune disease , use immunosuppressive medication . History anaphylaxis serious adverse reaction vaccine . Prior immunization rabies . History serious allergic reaction substance , require hospitalization emergent medical care ( e.g. , StevensJohnson syndrome , bronchospasm , hypotension ) . Prior psychiatric condition ( history suicide attempt past psychosis ) preclude compliance . History cancer unless surgical excision consider achieved cure . Prior Medication : Excluded : Live attenuate vaccine within 60 day prior study entry . NOTE : Medically indicate kill subunit vaccine ( e.g. , influenza , pneumococcal ) exclude administer least 2 week HIV immunization . Experimental agent within 30 day prior study entry . Prior HIV vaccine . Prior rabies immunization . Prior Treatment : Excluded : Blood product immunoglobulin within 6 month prior study entry . Identifiable highrisk behavior HIV infection , injection drug use within past 12 month . high intermediaterisk sexual behavior .
